channel.title: Adding your rank is: {pi}
channel.description: hey guys, i just added a log in interface , and i was wondering, how do i Your rank is: at the bottome of the message? thanks! ```MOCKPRO```

item.title: Adding your rank is: {pi}
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Idk, im guessing go into the client files, find the chunk of coding where its actually bringing the 2 login texts and button.
ADD a new interface/line, set the bounds etc, than just draw your text as default “Your rank is:”.
Than just modify it server sided to send text to it based off of their c.playerRank or we.

Read full topic

[quote=“hgaits, post:15, topic:424700”]I am sure I am not out of luck I ment, if I take out the rank thing the compile is fine. are you sure everything was put in right?[/quote]Ye im not sure how you would do it, there probably a more effiecent way then wat i was trying, im just not sure how and i really don’t feel like trying to find out.

item.title: Adding your rank is: {pi}
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

public void customInterface() { getPA().showInterface(3023); getPA().sendFrame126("Close Window", 3024);//Close Text getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1 getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners' are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("if (c.playerRights == 1) {", 3028);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("W.e. you want here", 3029);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("if (c.playerRights == 1) {", 3030);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("W.e. you want here", 3031);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("if (c.playerRights == 3) {", 3032;//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("W.e. you want here", 3033);//Line 2 getPA().sendFrame126("For a list of commands please type ::commands", 3034);//Line 4 getPA().sendFrame126("For the rules please tpye ::rules", 3035);//Line 5 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 6 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 7 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3038);//Line 8 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3039);//Line 9 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3040);//Line 10 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3041);//Line 11 getPA().sendFrame126("", 3042);//Line 12 flushOutStream(); }

Almost 100% sure this wont work.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding your rank is: {pi}
item.dc:creator: @hgaits hgaits
item.description:
@hgaits wrote:

public void customInterface() {
getPA().showInterface(3023);
getPA().sendFrame126(“Close Window”, 3024);//Close Text
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome To RedemptionX!!!", 3026);//Line 1
getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Your owners’ are Rachel and Trevor", 3027);//Line 2
getPA().sendFrame126(“if (c.playerRights == 1) {
Bla bla bla
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
Bla Bla Bla
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
Bla Bla Bla”, 3028);//Line 3
getPA().sendFrame126(“For a list of commands please type ::commands”, 3029);//Line 4
getPA().sendFrame126(“For the rules please tpye ::rules”, 3030);//Line 5
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3031);//Line 6
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3032);//Line 7
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3033);//Line 8
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3034);//Line 9
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3035);//Line 10
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3036);//Line 11
getPA().sendFrame126("", 3037);//Line 12
flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic
